page.title: 15Local children's games
page.content: {BALL GAMES: {Sevens:}throwing & catching-individual {Romeo Romeo:}group,includes guessing {Fireball:}group, catching & running {Tiggy-ball:}accurate throwing,dodging {CHASING AND CAPTURING GAMES:} {Bulldog:}selective catching {Cat & Mouse:}role-change, chaser becomes chased if fails to catch {40-40:}hiding, reaching safe are{ {Patrol:}hiding, avoiding capture, usually on bicycles. {GAMES OF BRAVADO:} {True, dare, double-dare, kiss, command {or promise:}task set; penalty for non- completion includes ridicule. {Knockadoor:Ringabell:Chuckaberry:}dare stand or run games - disturbing others {Grand National:}steeplechase course over garden fences and hedges, after dark to avoid capture (cont)
